column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE LOCATED THE PACKAGE. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
CHARLIE BLACK TO ALPHA BLACK. LANDING ZONE IN SIGHT, GET READY. OVER.
GOOD LUCK ALPHA. BRING THEM HOME. CHARLIE OUT.
CHARLIE TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
CHARLIE TO ALPHA. COPY THAT. WE ARE ON OUR WAY. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. UNDERSTOOD. BLOW THE HELO UP AND HEAD TO THE EXTRACT LOCATION. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. WELCOME BACK HOME. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
